title: Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it hits just below the knee, and appreciate its flattering design that shows off curves without being tight. The fabric receives positive feedback for being soft like a sweatshirt, not itchy, and one customer mentions it's perfect for fall weather. They like its appearance, with one noting it looks like a two-piece outfit, and appreciate its color options.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute
items.body: Beautiful dress! I ordered 2 colors. Material is quality. Just buy it!. I am138 lbs and ordered a small. It fit perfectly. It's very flattering Read more
items.author: Pscant

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks classy and it is very comfortable
items.body: Loved the feel of this dress, smooth, stretchy, and very soft. Great fabric and flattering waistband (not tight at all, just pulls the dress in slightly for a fabulous fit and look). Loved the sleeves and the cuffs were perfect if you happen to be short with shorter arms the band fits at the wrist so the sleeves will not be too long. I am 5'1" and the dress hits mid-knee which was what i was looking for as I will wear with high suede boots. For reference, I am 63 years old, bra is 32 D, and I weigh 118 lbs with a petite and young-looking figure. I will wear this to a friend's birthday party and will feel comfortable and confident in it! Read more
items.author: Bridget Beckett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the color
items.body: Very pleased! Small framed, 5ft, 130lbs, the waist is ribbed tightly. Ordered Medium. Nice fabric...wearing for Christmas party and wedding this month. Read more
items.author: Alsgal

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress
items.body: Beautiful dress, color is vibrant, fit well, not to thick, not see through! However, the neck opening is not wide enough to wear off shoulder, which is why I bought it. Read more
items.author: Alisa Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress that looks like a 2 piece. Slimming, hits above the knee
items.body: I loved this set, unfortunately I had to return it. I wanted something that covers my knees. I bought a size M and I'm 5'4 140 lbs. This dress hit just above that. I was so sad because it was exactly what i was looking for. Such a chick look. Love the puff sleeve, and I love that it looks like a 2 piece but is a 1 piece dress. I right away sent the link to other friends that are shorter then me so they can enjoy this beautiful dress. Great fabric and awesome style! Read more
items.author: Debra

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you need an XS Move on to a different item.
items.body: Unfortunately, this dress is not offered in an XS. I have tried 2 garments from this brand in Size S, as they do not offer the option of XS. I had to return this item. The other I kept, however, it is also big on me. The Quality of the dress seems nice. The fabric was a very tight weave so, I dont believe there would be any issues with transparency of under garments. It was also soft and although thin, heavy enough to be warm with out being bulky. The dress is quite large on me all over, and the sleeve is lantern style so obviously it is exaggerated. I am not sure if it was overly so due to the dress being large all over or if the sleeve was big even for the lantern style. It sticks out in my mind though reviewing the item after I returned it. I am 5' 2" and 107 lbs FYI. I like this brand I really wish they offered XS but if anyone is ordering hoping the small will fit due to it being the smallest offered, I did not find that to be the case. Read more
items.author: Lady K

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Dress!
items.body: Ladies this is a must-have for everyone's closet. Size fit perfect and it hugs all the right areas if you know what I mean. I paired it with a white belt and white Go-Go cowboy boots and just need to say I looked amazing. Everyone complimented me and wanted to know where I got my outfit. It stretches where needed and hugs where the curves are. The fabric yarn was good quality. It was soft and comfortable. Great value ladies! Trust a girl who only dresses up once in awhile, this is a must-have dress in everyone's closet or winter. Loved it! Read more
items.author: Chelle LN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: As shown on the picture and so beautiful fits amazing. Great quality Read more
items.author: Marci Harding

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Rust, Apricot, Black, Camel, Sage, Olive, Khaki, White, Purple, Teal, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
